snippet: The Catholic Archdiocese of Chicago released 6,000 pages of documents on sexually abusive priests on Wednesday to victims’ lawyers.
abstract: Catholic Archdiocese of Chicago releases 6,000 pages of documents on sexually abusive priests to victims' lawyers.
lead_paragraph: The Catholic Archdiocese of Chicago released 6,000 pages of documents on sexually abusive priests on Wednesday to victims’ lawyers.

headline.main: Illinois: Diocese Releases Papers on Abuse by Priests
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Diocese Releases Papers on Abuse by Priests
